abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32700336, pmid32709978, pmid32701135, pmid32600910, pmid32692903, pmid32706417, pmid32706339, pmid32706426, pmid32700547, pmid32696600, pmid32702192, pmid32701127, pmid32701376, pmid32425360
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.29
